mapper.select: SELECT province AS province, count(1) AS `number` FROM balance_location_info GROUP BY province
SELECT province AS province, count(1) AS `number` FROM balance_location_info WHERE create_time > #{currentDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY province

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT
IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province) > 0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createDay FROM balance_location_info )b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createDay, '%Y-%m') > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER } MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) AND createDay < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' GROUP BY province ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province)>0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province FROM balance_location_info HAVING dayTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b WHERE LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' GROUP BY province ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
